title: Lesson Plan: Chocolate, Ceramics, and Colonialism in Eighteenth-Century Mexico
copy: This lesson plan supports the integration of artworks into K-12 teaching. It focuses on a single work of art from the museum’s global collection and provides sequential activities and related resources and extensions that activate students’ critical and creative thinking skills, prompting them to deepen their sense of self, connect with others, and engage more fully with a complex world.   Additional Resources
